last_episode_to_air.name: Not Fade Away
last_episode_to_air.overview: Angel and his friend's prepare for their "suicide" attack on the circle of the Black Thorn.

name: Angel
overview: The vampire Angel, cursed with a soul, moves to Los Angeles and aids people with supernatural-related problems while questing for his own redemption. A spin-off from Buffy the Vampire Slayer.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Angel, the dashing demon from Buffy the Vampire Slayer, embarks on his own supernatural adventures in Los Angeles. City of Angels. City of Broken Dreams. Between pervasive evil and countless temptations lurking beneath the city's glittery facade, L.A is the ideal address for a fallen vampire looking to save a few lost souls and, in turn, perhaps redeem his own.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Angel continues to seek redemption in season two, but a fatal mistake makes him realize that racking up the body count isn’t the way to go. So with a renewed sense of purpose and Cordelia, Wesley and Gunn at his side, Angel sets out to make the streets of Los Angeles a little safer for everyone — unaware that Wolfram & Hart has summoned someone from his past to make sure he fails.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Even as Angel mourns the death of Buffy, Darla makes her way to L.A. with a mysterious new life growing within her. Now thrust into a role he never imagined, Angel needs the assistance of the Angel Investigations team more than ever. But while Cordelia, Gunn and Fred rally round the new dad, an ancient and deadly prophecy convinces Wesley to commit the ultimate betrayal.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: With both Angel and Cordelia still missing, Fred, Gunn and Connor try to keep Angel Investigations running while they search for their friends.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: The Angel Investigations team is stunned when the Senior Partners of Wolfram and Hart give them control of the L.A. office. The gang quickly moves in, and although everyone is delighted at the amazing resources they now have at their command, they can’t stop wondering what the catch is.

episodes.name: City of
episodes.overview: Angel moves to L.A. where he meets up with Cordelia, another Sunnydale transplant who comes to work for him, and Doyle, a half-demon who gets visions of people in trouble.

episodes.name: Lonely Heart
episodes.overview: Angel, with the aid of a new friend, tracks a serial killer whose hunting ground is L.A.'s single bars.

episodes.name: In the Dark
episodes.overview: Spike follows Oz to L.A. and enlists the help of a demented vampire to regain a mystical relic from Angel.

episodes.name: I Fall to Pieces
episodes.overview: A desperate young woman pleads for Angel's help, as her disembodied stalker grows more violent. Meanwhile Doyle goes to work with Melissa.

episodes.name: Rm w/a Vu
episodes.overview: Cordelia finds a perfect apartment, but it's got just one flaw: it's haunted. Meanwhile, Doyle flees the phantoms of his past.

episodes.name: Sense & Sensitivity
episodes.overview: Kate's temper buys her a trip to sensitivity training, which has a strange effect on her... and those around her.

episodes.name: Bachelor Party
episodes.overview: Doyle's past love comes to town, but her new fiancé has other plans for him. Doyle gets a vision of Buffy.

episodes.name: I Will Remember You
episodes.overview: Old feelings are rekindled when Buffy comes to L.A. to visit Angel. Buffy and Angel are attacked by a Mohra demon, and together they slay it

episodes.name: Hero
episodes.overview: Doyle is presented with an opportunity for atonement when a band of frightened refugees seek his help.

episodes.name: Parting Gifts
episodes.overview: Angel and Cordelia, still coping with the death of their friend, are aided by an old friend in the pursuit of a demon bounty.

episodes.name: Somnambulist
episodes.overview: When a killer stalks the L.A. streets using a mark that Angelus once used, Angel must face the possibility that he is committing the murders in his sleep.

episodes.name: Expecting
episodes.overview: After a one-night stand goes bad, Cordelia wakes up to find herself extremely pregnant with something extremely unnatural.

episodes.name: She
episodes.overview: Angel forms tenuous truce with a warrior demon in order to save refugees from another dimension.

episodes.name: I've Got You Under My Skin
episodes.overview: A troubled family enlists Angel and Wesley to help them exorcise their resident demon.

episodes.name: The Prodigal
episodes.overview: Angel's conflict with Kate and her dad stirs up memories of his own father.

episodes.name: The Ring
episodes.overview: In pursuit of a missing man, Angel becomes enslaved to an underground-fighting ring.

episodes.name: Eternity
episodes.overview: When an embattled celebrity enlists Angel to protect her from a stalker, her interest in Angel could cost him his soul.

episodes.name: Five by Five
episodes.overview: Rogue slayer Faith comes to town, and when she partners up with Wolfram and Hart , Angel's life is in danger.

episodes.name: Sanctuary
episodes.overview: Everyone, including Buffy Summers, is out to get Faith, and Angel is the only man who can stop them.

episodes.name: War Zone
episodes.overview: When Angel tracks down a millionaire's blackmailer, he gets caught in the middle of a gang war between street kids and vampires.

episodes.name: Blind Date
episodes.overview: Angel must break into Wolfram and Hart to prevent an assassin from carrying out her deadly mission.

episodes.name: To Shanshu in L.A.
episodes.overview: Wolfram and Hart raise a powerful new foe to strike down Angel and those close to him.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Angel, the dashing demon from Buffy the Vampire Slayer, embarks on his own supernatural adventures in Los Angeles. City of Angels. City of Broken Dreams. Between pervasive evil and countless temptations lurking beneath the city's glittery facade, L.A is the ideal address for a fallen vampire looking to save a few lost souls and, in turn, perhaps redeem his own.

episodes.name: Judgement
episodes.overview: Angel protects a pregnant woman being hunted down by demons after he inadvertently slays her guardian.

episodes.name: Are You Now or Have You Ever Been
episodes.overview: In the 1950s, Angel aids a woman hiding from her past inside a hotel with a long history of death and mayhem. Meanwhile, in the present day, Angel and his colleagues hunt down a demon responsible for the carnage.

episodes.name: First Impressions
episodes.overview: Angel encounters an amorous Darla in his dreams; Cordelia vows to protect Gunn after she experiences a vision depicting him in mortal danger.

episodes.name: Untouched
episodes.overview: Angel attempts to help a girl with telekinetic powers before she falls into the hands of Wolfram and Hart.

episodes.name: Dear Boy
episodes.overview: Darla attempts to drive Angel over the edge in hopes of getting him to embrace his dark side.

episodes.name: Guise Will Be Guise
episodes.overview: Angel meets with a swami in hopes of ending his obsession with Darla; meanwhile, Wesley assumes Angel's identity and plays bodyguard to a wealthy business man's daughter.

episodes.name: Darla
episodes.overview: Lindsey finds himself drawn to Darla as her mental state deteriorates.

episodes.name: The Shroud of Rahmon
episodes.overview: Angel goes undercover with the help of the witty and street smart Gunn in order to prevent a mind-altering shroud from falling into the wrong hands.

episodes.name: The Trial
episodes.overview: Still haunted by flashbacks of his 150-year fling with the dreaded Darla, Angel sends Gunn out to find her.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: The newly revamped deadly duo of Drusilla and Darla hit the streets of L.A. Angel is frantic, searching for the terrible twosome.

episodes.name: Redefinition
episodes.overview: Angel takes on Darla and Drusilla as they hold try-outs for people who want to wreak havoc.

episodes.name: Blood Money
episodes.overview: Angel threatens to reveal Wolfram and Hart's criminal activities when he discovers they're stealing large contributions being made to a teen shelter. However, someone from Angel's past has other plans for him.

episodes.name: Happy Anniversary
episodes.overview: Angel and The Host search for a physicist who, with the aid of to Lubber demons, plans to freeze time so the he and his girlfriend will live in eternal happiness. Meanwhile, Wesley, Cordelia and Gunn start their first official case.

episodes.name: The Thin Dead Line
episodes.overview: Angel teams up with Kate to investigate the rumours of "dead" renegade police who are out for blood. Cordelia, Wesley and Gunn carry out their own investigation that results in Wesley being seriously wounded by a police gunshot.

episodes.name: Reprise
episodes.overview: Wolfram and Hart's senior partner is coming to visit. When Angel learns that the "senior partner" is actually an evil and merciless demon from hell, he must sacrifice his own life to destroy the powerful beast.

episodes.name: Epiphany
episodes.overview: After an empty night of passion with Darla, Angel wakes up with his soul still intact and has an epiphany. Angel tries to reunite with his former employees,but Cordelia, Wesley and Gunn are reluctant to forgive him, even when their lives are at stake.

episodes.name: Disharmony
episodes.overview: While the group tries to track down a cult of vampires with a wicked scheme, Cordelia gets a surprise visit from her high school friend Harmony. Unaware that Harmony is now a vampire, Cordelia invites her to join the team on a mission.

episodes.name: Dead End
episodes.overview: Cordelia's visions get worse and the gang fears for her health. Meanwhile Lindsey is granted a new hand that has a murderous mind of its own.

episodes.name: Belonging
episodes.overview: Angel and his crew must find a way to kill a bloodthirsty demon who has arrived in town from another dimension through a mysterious, magical portal.

episodes.name: Over the Rainbow
episodes.overview: Cordelia realises she was transported into a demon dimension where humans are considered inferior and sold into slavery. When Angel, Gunn, Wesley and the Host jump through the portal in search of her, they are attacked by an angry mob of villagers.

episodes.name: Through the Looking Glass
episodes.overview: Angel, Gunn, Wesley and the Host are sentenced to death by the villagers. They are brought before the princess of Pylea, who they are shocked to discover is Her Royal Highness Cordelia. Soon, Cordelia discovers one of her duties as princess is mating with a creature called the Groossalugg.

episodes.name: There's No Place Like Plrtz Glrb
episodes.overview: Angel struggles with the inner beast the demon dimension brings out in him, while Wesley and Gunn join with rebel forces to overthrow the government and Her Majesty. It's up to Cordelia to save the Host him while Angel seeks help to rescue everyone and return home.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Angel continues to seek redemption in season two, but a fatal mistake makes him realize that racking up the body count isn’t the way to go. So with a renewed sense of purpose and Cordelia, Wesley and Gunn at his side, Angel sets out to make the streets of Los Angeles a little safer for everyone — unaware that Wolfram & Hart has summoned someone from his past to make sure he fails.

episodes.name: Heartthrob
episodes.overview: As Angel mourns Buffy's death, he battles a lovelorn vampire seeking revenge for the death of his beloved, who was killed by Angel.

episodes.name: That Vision Thing
episodes.overview: Lilah coerces Angel to help in securing the release of a prisoner the powers that be have locked in a fiery prison.

episodes.name: That Old Gang of Mine
episodes.overview: Gunn's loyalties are torn between his current demon-hunting associates and the gang he used to hang out with, which has taken to killing demons for fun instead of defence.

episodes.name: Carpe Noctem
episodes.overview: An old man uses an ancient incantation to switch bodies with Angel.

episodes.name: Fredless
episodes.overview: When Fred's parents come to take her home, she feels she should go with them...until she earns a place in the group by figuring out the key to an attack of larger bug demons.

episodes.name: Billy
episodes.overview: Angel's friends are affected by a man with the power to make other men brutalise women.

episodes.name: Offspring
episodes.overview: Darla returns and reveals that she is pregnant with Angel's child.

episodes.name: Quickening
episodes.overview: As Angel and his friends try to determine what kind of baby Darla will have, Holtz starts his search for Angel... while Lilah and Nathan send out a SWAT team to find Darla.

episodes.name: Lullaby
episodes.overview: As Darla goes through a difficult labour, Holtz pursues Angel.

episodes.name: Dad
episodes.overview: Angel tries to keep his son safe from the many demons, vampires and humans who would like to harm the baby; Holtz joins forces with another vampire slayer.

episodes.name: Birthday
episodes.overview: On her birthday, Cordelia learns her visions will kill her unless she goes back in time and chooses a different path in life - which doesn't include Angel.

episodes.name: Provider
episodes.overview: Fred solves a puzzle for a group of demons who literally want to buy her brain; Angel is hired to clean out a vampire nest by a man who can't afford to pay for Angel's services; Wes and Gunn help a woman whose dead boyfriend is stalking her.

episodes.name: Waiting in the Wings
episodes.overview: Angel and his friends attend a ballet,where Angel realises he saw the exact same dancers on stage 110 years ago.

episodes.name: Couplet
episodes.overview: Angel struggles with his jealousy of the Groosalugg and Cordelia's attraction to him; Gunn and Fred get captured by a tree monster.

episodes.name: Loyalty
episodes.overview: Wes dreads the fulfilment of the prophecy that Angel will kill Connor; Sahjhan becomes dissatisfied with Holtz's progress in stalking Angel and take matters into his own hands; Fred and Gunn try to figure out how to juggle working together with their new romance.

episodes.name: Sleep Tight
episodes.overview: To save Connor's life, Wes takes him away from Angel; Angel uncovers Lilah's plot to have him kill Connor, Holtz finally attacks.

episodes.name: Forgiving
episodes.overview: As Fred and Gunn search for Wesley, Angel searches for Sahjhan - and casts a spell to make him corporeal so he can be killed.

episodes.name: Double or Nothing
episodes.overview: When a demon that Gunn once sold his soul to comes to collect on the debt, Angel, Fred and Cordelia help to save him.

episodes.name: The Price
episodes.overview: Angel's hotel is infested with demonic slugscreated by the spell he used to alter Sahjhan.

episodes.name: A New World
episodes.overview: Angel pursues Connor, who makes a new friend on the streets; something else comes through the portal from Quor-toth; Lilah approaches Wesley.

episodes.name: Benediction
episodes.overview: Holtz insists that Connor rejoins Angel; Justine learns Holtz is back; the Groosalugg realises the depths of Cordelia's feelings for Angel.

episodes.name: Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Connor returns to Angel to seek his revenge; Angel and Cordelia acknowledge their feelings for each other.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Even as Angel mourns the death of Buffy, Darla makes her way to L.A. with a mysterious new life growing within her. Now thrust into a role he never imagined, Angel needs the assistance of the Angel Investigations team more than ever. But while Cordelia, Gunn and Fred rally round the new dad, an ancient and deadly prophecy convinces Wesley to commit the ultimate betrayal.

episodes.name: Deep Down
episodes.overview: As Fred and Gunn search for Angel, Wesley continues his affair with Lilah and conducts his own, more fruitful, search.

episodes.name: Ground State
episodes.overview: In his quest to steal an artifact that may help him find Cordelia, Angel finds himself competing with a human thief whose body is electrically charged.

episodes.name: The House Always Wins
episodes.overview: Angel and his friends discover that Lorne is being held prisoner in a corrupt Las Vegas casino.

episodes.name: Slouching Toward Bethlehem
episodes.overview: After Cordelia returns, she doesn't remember her friends and Lorne senses a major evil brewing. Scared by the world of demons and vampires, Cordelia takes refuge with Connor, who saves her from a demon attack.

episodes.name: Supersymmetry
episodes.overview: Fred discovers her old physics professor is the one who exiled her to Pylea; Cordelia can't get comfortable with Connor and begins to wonder more about her history with Angel.

episodes.name: Spin the Bottle
episodes.overview: Lorne's spell to restore Cordelia's memory backfires and convinces everyone they're high school students who have been gathered to kill a vampire: Angel.

episodes.name: Apocalypse, Nowish
episodes.overview: As plagues of various pests descend on Los Angeles, the beast Cordelia saw in her vision returns - and the apocalypse begins.

episodes.name: Habeas Corpses
episodes.overview: Connor gets locked inside Wolfram and Hart with the Big Bad doomsday beast, who turns the legal firms staff into an army of zombies.

episodes.name: Long Day's Journey
episodes.overview: After a group of totems linked to the ancient sun god Ra are killed by the Big Bad beast, Angel and his friends realize he's plotting to turn off the sun.

episodes.name: Awakening
episodes.overview: Angel agrees to try to bring Angelus back... but after the first attempt fails, he and his friends discover a magic sword that might do a better job of getting rid of the Big Bad beast.

episodes.name: Soulless
episodes.overview: After Angelus succeeds in setting Angel's friends against each other, Cordelia makes him a deal: if he tells what he knows about the Big Bad beast, she'll give herself to him.

episodes.name: Calvary
episodes.overview: After learning the doomsday beast may be working for something bigger and badder than itself, Angel's friends cast a spell to return his soul to Angelus' body.

episodes.name: Salvage
episodes.overview: While Lorne casts a sanctuary spell on the hotel, and Wesley brings in the slayer, Faith, to help get Angelus back... the Doomsday Beast and its boss also try to woo Angelus.

episodes.name: Release
episodes.overview: As Faith and Angel continue their battle, the voice of the Beast's Master invades Angel's mind.

episodes.name: Orpheus
episodes.overview: As Faith and Angelus lay drugged and possibly dying, they flash back to key events in Angel's life... and Willow comes to help the others in the quest to restore Angel's soul.

episodes.name: Players
episodes.overview: As Angel tries to remember what Lilah's book said about the Master, Lorne plans a cleansing ritual to regain his empathetic powers, and Gunn helps Gwen with some corporate espionage.

episodes.name: Inside Out
episodes.overview: As Cordelia prepares to give birth, Angel and his friends finally learn that she - or an evil presence controlling her - is the Beast's master.

episodes.name: Shiny Happy People
episodes.overview: While everyone else worships the beautiful woman Cordelia bore, Fred sees another side of her.

episodes.name: The Magic Bullet
episodes.overview: As Jasmine's influence continues to spread, Fred finally tricks Angel into seeing her true nature.

episodes.name: Sacrifice
episodes.overview: While hiding in a sewer, Angel and his friends battle a nasty monster provides some clues that might help in the larger battle against Jasmine.

episodes.name: Peace Out
episodes.overview: Angel returns from the monster's dimension and finally defuses Jasmine's all-compassing powers.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: Lilah returns from the dead to offer Angel and his friends full ownership of Wolfram and Hart.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: With both Angel and Cordelia still missing, Fred, Gunn and Connor try to keep Angel Investigations running while they search for their friends.

episodes.name: Conviction
episodes.overview: Some old acquaintances come back into Angel's life as he and his friends begin running Wolfram and Hart and try to figure out why they've been selected to do so.

episodes.name: Just Rewards
episodes.overview: Angel and Spike challenge a necromancer who is unhappy with Wolfram and Hart's new leadership.

episodes.name: Unleashed
episodes.overview: Angel tries to help a young woman who has been turned into a werewolf and is being pursued by a group of truly rarified gourmets.

episodes.name: Hell Bound
episodes.overview: After being menaced by a series of gruesome ghosts no one else can see, Spike finally comes face to face with the spectral being who's been trying to drag him into hell.

episodes.name: Life of the Party
episodes.overview: Strange things happen when Lorne has his sleep removed right before Wolfram and Hart's big Halloween party.

episodes.name: The Cautionary Tale of Numero Cinco
episodes.overview: While losing heart for his own career as a hero, Angel befriends a disheartened, elderly hero, and battles an Aztec warrior who literally eats the hearts of heroes.

episodes.name: Lineage
episodes.overview: When Wesley's father visits Wolfram and Hart, the firm is attacked by a troop of spooky Ninja cyborgs.

episodes.name: Destiny
episodes.overview: After Spike receives a strange package, Wolfram and Hart employees are possessed by evil... while Angel and Spike are set against each other in a quest that brings their 100-year-old rivalry to a head.

episodes.name: Harm's Way
episodes.overview: When Harmony wakes up next to a dead man with vampire bites in his neck, she's afraid she lost her head and killed him... but she can't remember doing it.

episodes.name: Soul Purpose
episodes.overview: When Spike is talked into taking up the good-deeds business, Eve lets loose a soul sucking parasite on Angel, who then suffers disturbing feverish hallucinations as he sleeps.

episodes.name: Damage
episodes.overview: A deranged vampire slayer is convinced that spike is the man who kidnapped and tortured her when she was a child.

episodes.name: You're Welcome
episodes.overview: When Lindsey returns and tries to defeat Angel using a secret "failsafe" entity created by the Powers That Be, Cordelia emerges from her coma to help save Angel.

episodes.name: Why We Fight
episodes.overview: A World War II submarine sailor - the only man Angel ever turned into a vampire since regaining his soul - returns to seek his revenge.

episodes.name: Smile Time
episodes.overview: While Nina the werewolf show romantic interest in Angel, he investigates a demon-infested children's television program and gets turned into a puppet; Gunn makes a deal to keep his newly implanted mental powers; and Wes and Fred's relationship heats up.

episodes.name: A Hole in the World
episodes.overview: After being breathed on by an ancient sarcophagus, Fred contracts a mystery illness and lies near death while Angel and his friends try to figure out what's wrong with her.

episodes.name: Shells
episodes.overview: Mourning Fred's death, Angel and his friends vow to find a way to bring her back, which leads to a confrontation with the ancient god Illyria, who now occupies Fred's body.

episodes.name: Underneath
episodes.overview: Angel, Gunn and Spike rescue Lindsey from a suburban hell dimension; Lorne and Eve are pursued by a representative of the senior partners; and Wesley consoles Illyria, who hates her new world.

episodes.name: Origin
episodes.overview: When a warlock brings Connor back into Angel's life, Wesley finds out that Angel has tinkered with the memories of his friends.

episodes.name: Time Bomb
episodes.overview: As Angel and Hamilton urge Wesley to get rid of Illyria, she suffers a cataclysmic physical breakdown; and Gunn clashes with Angel over the enforcement of an evil demon contract.

episodes.name: The Girl in Question
episodes.overview: While Angel and Spike to go Italy to retrieve the head of a demon mobster (and save Buffy from a new suitor), Fred's parents arrive at Wolfram and Hart, looking for their daughter.

episodes.name: Power Play
episodes.overview: As Angel's behaviour grows increasingly hostile, his friends learn he's associating with members of an evil secret society, and may have deliberately engineered Fred's death.

episodes.name: Not Fade Away
episodes.overview: Angel and his friend's prepare for their "suicide" attack on the circle of the Black Thorn.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: The Angel Investigations team is stunned when the Senior Partners of Wolfram and Hart give them control of the L.A. office. The gang quickly moves in, and although everyone is delighted at the amazing resources they now have at their command, they can’t stop wondering what the catch is.
